thread.title: Relentlessly helpful staff
thread.title_full: Relentlessly helpful staff - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: C8206JOscottw
title: Relentlessly helpful staff
text: I have been staying at this hotel for the last three years. Its convenience and proximity to my office were my primary reasons for staying here, but after the staff helped me recover some lost items when I had to leave abruptly, I feel extremely grateful to the excellent staff of this hotel.
